//time_0
//#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <math.h>
#include <stdint.h>
#include <string>
#define intt long int
#define take cin>>
#define print cout<<
#define line <<endl
#define space <<" "
#define pb push_back
#define tcs int t; cin>>t; while(t--)
using namespace std;
 
int main(){
	tcs{
		string s;
        cin>>s;
        cout<<s[0];
 
        for(int i=1;i<s.length();i++)
        {
            if(s[i]==s[i-1])
                printf("0");
            else
                printf("1");
        }
 
        printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
